newsitem.title: RUSSIA: Russian Duma to discuss 97 draft budget on Oct 11.
newsitem.headline: Russian Duma to discuss 97 draft budget on Oct 11.

text.p: The Russian State Duma, the lower house of parliament, will consider the 1997 draft budget on October 11 in the first reading, Itar-Tass news agency quoted the head of the Duma budget committee as saying on Wednesday.
Mikhail Zadornov told Itar-Tass that the Duma needed to debate some tax legislation before discussing the budget.
The draft 1997 budget handed to the Duma provides for a deficit of 3.30 percent of gross domestic product compared with a budgeted deficit of 3.85 percent this year.
The draft assumes annual inflation of 9.50 percent, and one percent industrial production growth after a fall of about four percent this year.
